sentences.en: But even here the exuberant and barbaric fancy asserted itself.
sentences.cn: 但是即使在这个地方,丰富野蛮的幻想也显示出自己的权威性.

sentences.en: But it would help if they a little more barbaric.
sentences.cn: 但如果它们更野蛮一些,也许事情就更好办了.

sentences.en: His plans were bold and fiery, and his conceptions glowed with barbaric lustre.
sentences.cn: 他的设计豪放不羁, 他的主意如同迸射出的犷悍的火花.

sentences.en: I sound my barbaric yawp over the rooftops of the world.
sentences.cn: 我听见我那原始野蛮的嗥叫越过世界的屋脊.

sentences.en: It is a frankly barbaric tale.
sentences.cn: 这是一段赤裸裸的野蛮故事.

sentences.en: It's a devastating and barbaric act that defies all comprehension.
sentences.cn: 这种行为野蛮凶残、令人震惊，简直是不可理喻。

sentences.en: Soon the Red devils tasted the bitter wrath of their barbaric brothers.
sentences.cn: 很快红色的魔鬼尝了他们的野蛮兄弟的痛苦愤怒.

sentences.en: The barbaric slaughter of whales is unnecessary and inhuman.
sentences.cn: 对鲸的野蛮屠杀既不必要也不人道。

sentences.en: The explorer was killed by barbaric people.
sentences.cn: 那位探险家被野蛮人杀死了.

sentences.en: The football march had to be paused because of the barbaric supporters.
sentences.cn: 因为那些野蛮的助威者,足球比赛不得不暂停.

sentences.en: The harsh intervals and shrill discords of barbaric music stirred him at times.
sentences.cn: 有时候,这种蛮子音乐的狂暴音程和尖利的不协和音很能打动他.

sentences.en: The tribal dance was a spectacle of barbaric splendour.
sentences.cn: 部落舞展示了一场五颜六色的半开化先民的奇观.

sentences.en: The way the whales are killed is nothing short of barbaric.
sentences.cn: 对鲸的捕杀方式简直就是野蛮。

sentences.en: There will be barbaric darkness for a thousand years.
sentences.cn: 接着就会是一千年的野蛮黑暗时期.

sentences.en: This barbaric practice should be banned immediately.
sentences.cn: 这种野蛮行径应立刻予以禁止.

sentences.en: This was the kings semi - barbaric method of administering justice.
sentences.cn: 这是执法国王的半野蛮方法.

trans.tran_cn: 野蛮的，半开化的，粗俗的，蒙昧
